item.title: Nazi Zombies models
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

I was requested to release these by wayzey.

Flamethrower, Ray Gun, Thompson, Sniper Rifle.

Flamethrower-Frell, Galkon for triangulated
Ray Gun-Some site
Thompson-Some site
Sniper Rifle-Dragmagic



if(i == 11340) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 10402; //Model ID class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 2290; class8.anInt190 = 588; class8.anInt198 = 1985; class8.anInt169 = 4; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 10402;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 10402;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = 13872; class8.anInt164 = 13344; class8.anInt188 = 13335; class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Thompson";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A Thompson, submachine-gun. ".getBytes();//examine info } if(i == 11341) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 10403; //Model ID class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 2290; class8.anInt190 = 588; class8.anInt198 = 1985; class8.anInt169 = 4; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 10403;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 10403;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = 13872; class8.anInt164 = 13344; class8.anInt188 = 13335; class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Ray Gun";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Alien weaponry used to defeat zombies. ".getBytes();//examine info } if(i == 11342) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip";//New option class8.anInt174 = 10405; //Model ID class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 2290; class8.anInt190 = 588; class8.anInt198 = 1985; class8.anInt169 = 4; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 10405;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 10405;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = 13872; class8.anInt164 = 13344; class8.anInt188 = 13335; class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Flamethrower";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A flamethrower. ".getBytes();//examine info }

    http://www.mediafire.com/?z2gbmbngimy

For the flamethrower. Set the animations to these. The flamethrower is fit to these animation as in his hands will be holding it correctly.(the above picture doesn’t use that animation. That’s my new server which doesn’t have the anim added.(yet))

Run animation

if(id == 11342) { return 2042; }

Walk animation

if(id == 11342) { return 2041; }

Stand animation

if(id == 11342) { return 2040; }

Just use the bow animation for attacks for all of them.
